p: β-Glucan, one of the major bioactive substances present in several medicinal mushrooms like Phellinus and Chaga, strengthens the immune system and has antitumor effect ( Chan et al., 2009; Goodridge et al., 2009). β-Glucan increases the number of white blood cells to improve the immunity of cellular tissues, and acts as an antidiabetic and a regulator of blood pressure ( Chandrasekaran et al., 2011).
